_meta.source: Researched from Destination NSW, TripAdvisor, and local guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers Circular Quay, Bondi, Manly, and inner harbor

transit_routes.name: Sydney Ferries
transit_routes.note: Ferries depart from Circular Quay wharves. Use Opal card for discounted fares.

transit_routes.name: Harbor Foreshore Walk
transit_routes.note: All harbor attractions walkable. Beautiful foreshore paths.

featured_experiences.name: BridgeClimb Sydney
featured_experiences.note: Book ahead. $150-400+ depending on climb type. Dawn and twilight climbs popular.

featured_experiences.name: Bondi to Bronte Walk
featured_experiences.note: 6km spectacular coastal walk. Free. Bus from Circular Quay to Bondi takes 40 min.

featured_experiences.name: Manly Ferry & Beach
featured_experiences.note: Ferry from Circular Quay is half the experience. Return via fast ferry if short on time.
